data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Trouessartia (Acari, Trouessartiidae) from laughingthrushes (Passeriformes, Leiothrichidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Constantinescu, Ioana Cristina, Cobzaru, Ioana, Mukhim, D. Khlur B., Adam, Costică (2016): Two new species of the genus Trouessartia (Acari, Trouessartiidae) from laughingthrushes (Passeriformes, Leiothrichidae). ZooKeys 571: 59-79, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.571.7724, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.571.7724
